ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what will convey to you what that is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How will you comprehend what that is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And what do you know what that is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew what hawiya his?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what have you understood, what the one that abases is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know what it is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you know what it is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And what shall teach thee what is the Pit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah, what will convey unto thee what she is! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What will convey to you what this is like?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what shall make thee know that which she is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what it is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee what this is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know what it is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What shall let you know what the Plunging is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you know what it is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what that is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [101:10] And what will show you what it is?, that is to say, what the Abyss is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ah, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad (what she is!) this is to show how tremendous she is,
